product.name: Savvy Plus
product.shortDescription: Do your banking for a fixed monthly fee and enjoy the flexibility of adding benefits, such as an overdraft facility and Nedbank Greenbacks Rewards membership, when you need them.

benefits: Unlimited deposits at cash-accepting Nedbank ATMs.
Unlimited cash withdrawals at point-of-sale devices at participating retailers.
Four free monthly withdrawals at Nedbank ATMs.
Free digital banking through online banking, the Nedbank Money app and Cellphone Banking.
Access to the mobile-based Nedbank MobiMoney Account.
Access to MyPocket â€“ a free budgeting and savings pocket linked to your account.
The option of an overdraft facility.
Access to Send-iMali to send money quickly and securely to any South African cellphone.

productAttributes.name: Cashwithdrawalsatparticipatingretailers
productAttributes.description: Unlimited cash withdrawals at participating retailers point-of-sale included

features.name: My Pocket
features.shortDescription: Saving facility on a current account

features.name: eNotes(SMS)
features.shortDescription: Keep track of your finances with the eNotes SMS notifications, anytime, anywhere. eNotes keeps you informed about all transactions on your account.

features.name: No funds alert
features.shortDescription: Electronic notifications when you have insufficient funds for an attempted debit order

features.name: Debit Order Switching
features.shortDescription: Debit Order Switching with transactional product

salesHighlights.question: Can I use my card at toll gates?
Can I do online transactions?
salesHighlights.answer: Yes, you can do local and international online transactions.

features.name: Nedbank Insurance Funeral Plan
features.shortDescription: The Nedbank Insurance Funeral Plan provides cover that will help you to secure a dignified funeral for yourself or your family members. If you choose this option, we'll get in touch with you to finalise the sale.

features.name: Free Cash withdrawal at participating Retailers
features.shortDescription: Free Cash withdrawal at participating Retailers

features.shortDescription: Accelerate your Greenbacks rewards with the Amex Card
